title: Planning Department's Current Planning Team Boundaries
description:
A. SUMMARY
These boundaries are the areas of responsibility of the Planning Department's Current Planning teams. Building permits and Planning records are assigned to planning staff on a geographic basis to the Current Planning teams. These areas are based on Supervisorial Districts.

B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED
Team boundaries are an aggregation of supervisorial districts.

C. UPDATE PROCESS
Boundaries change every 10 years (when supervisorial districts are updated).  Attribute data changes occasionally.  Updates are manual.

D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET
Building permits and Planning records are assigned to planning staff on a geographic basis to the Current Planning teams.
